title: [1.1]CJB Mod 5.3.1 -2/5-
author: q1059024337
txt_content:
本帖最后由 q1059024337 于 2012-2-5 21:18 编辑 

v5.3.1
- Fixed Player speed（修正玩家速度）


v5.3.0
- Added Run Speed （新增跑步加速）
- Added Auto Jump （新增自动跳跃）
- Removed always speed for fly and run （移除总是为飞行和跑步加速）
- Added Speed Mode (toggle/hold speed key) （增加“加速模式” 开关型或按住型加速键）
- Support for Forge 1.3.2 （兼容Forge 1.3.2）

v5.2.9
- Aded new item: Sack with 3 different sizes(Iron, Gold, Diamond) （增加铁金钻三种不同大小的背包）
- Removed Bunny mob （移除兔子）

v5.2.8
- switch between 2 waypoint indicators（可在两种路点指示物间切换）
- Fixed Teleport for SMP（修正：传送功能兼容SMP）
- Fixed players waypoints（修正：玩家路点）
- Added tooltips in CJB Mods Menu（增加每项功能解释：鼠标在选项上停留一会儿出现）
- Fixed minor issues with minimap（翻译不能）
- More Info now also show when its going to rain/thunder（“更多信息”新增天气预报功能）

v5.2.7
- Added: New Item Portable Furnace（增加“移动熔炉”）
- Changed Waypoint indicator（修改路点指示物）
- Waypoints are now also shown on minimap（路点显示在小地图上）
- Mark players as waypoint（玩家以路点形式标记）

v5.2.6
- Fixed: Minimap visuals （修正：小地图外观）
- Changed behaviour of attractive items（改变“自动捡物品”的动作）
- Added new cheat Pickup Distance.（新的作弊功能：拾物判定范围修改）
- Sorted cheats in different category's（重新分类排列不同的作弊功能）

v5.2.5
- Change category Waypoint to Minimap.（改变小地图的路点外观）
- Moved Minimap options to Minimap -> Options（把小地图选项移动到“小地图→选项”- =）
- Moved Waypoint to Minimap -> Waypoints（把路点移动到“小地图→路点”）
- Waypoints are now shown seperatly for each dimention (previous waypoints might be losst)（翻译不能）
- Teleport Locations are now shown seperatly for each dimention (previous Teleport Locations might be losst)（翻译不能）
- Added Border textures for Minimap.（为小地图边框加上材质）
- Added option to disable minimap borders（为小地图边框材质加上开关）
- Added change size of minimap (not zoom)（为小地图加上改变尺寸功能-不是缩放-）
- Changed Slimechunks color（修改了史莱姆刷出区域的颜色）
- Changed small tweaks to entity sizes（翻译不能）

v5.2.4
- Fixed: Minecart Control（修正“矿车控制”功能）
- Fixed: Activating some blocks when infinite items is disabled（修正在“无限物品”功能打开时的“自动拾物”功能）（？）

v5.2.3
- Added: Infinite Items cheat（增加“无限物品”功能）
- Added: Infinite XP（增加“无限经验”功能）
- Added: Compatibility with Forge 1.3.0（兼容Forge 1.3.0）
- Added: Fast Growth for Vines and  Mushrooms（“快速生长”功能对蘑菇和藤蔓有效）
- Added: Second class for flying（第二级飞行）（？）
- Added: Disable Rain/Thundering（增加“关闭下雨”&“关闭打雷”功能）
- Fixed: Mobspawner no longer opens menu on placing.（修正：和平难度下的“可修改的怪物笼子”功能）

Wrath of Notch | ID's 3920, 3921
This item allows you to cast Lightning bolts from the sky. each item can be used 10 times and is easily recharged.




Nightvision Goggles | ID 3922
This item allows you to see better in darkness.



Portable Workbench | ID 3923
This item allows you to use to open a Workbench Gui anywhere when you right-click with item in hand.



Pressure Plate Iron | DEFAULT ID 200
This block will only activate when walked over by player.



Pressure Plate Gold | DEFAULT ID 201
This block will only activate when walked over by a creature.



Pressure Plates Reversed | DEFAULT IDS 198 199 202 203
These pressure plates are powered by default, once they are pressed they will deactivate.



Trashcan | DEFAULT ID 204
Dispose your unwanted stuff in here!



Recycler | DEFAULT ID 205
The Recycler will revert your crafted items with no loss of resources. 



Mesh Block| DEFAULT ID 206
Used as a floor, Mobs can walk over it, but items will fall through it. 



Dog Biscuits | ID 3940
When thrown at a mob, your tamed dogs will attack that mob. 



Razor Wind | ID 3924
This weapon will blow mobs/items/arrows backwards with a powerful wind.



Mobster Wand | ID 3925
With this item you can spawn mobs anywhere you want. Hold Shift and right click will open a menu where you can select your desired mob.



Portable furnace | ID 3926
Smelt materials while being on the road.

replies.author: numnum
replies.txt_content: 感觉。。。如果用这些mod玩survival没啥意思....还行吧...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: cjb那些方块东西还是不错的 不作弊好

replies.author: zzcat770
replies.txt_content: 提一下，好像与TMI、rei·s小地图或汉化补丁有冲突，会黑屏

replies.author: Kirara_bome
replies.txt_content: 一直不知道CJB怎么安的路过
标题: RE:好东西顶上去！

replies.author: wzksnc
replies.txt_content:
Mobster Wand | ID 3925
这玩意可以改变变出来的MOB,我无意间按出来,可是现在想换不知道按哪个键

replies.author: q1059024337
replies.txt_content:
wzksnc 发表于 2012-2-5 18:08 
Mobster Wand | ID 3925
这玩意可以改变变出来的MOB,我无意间按出来,可是现在想换不知道按哪个键
这个需要该ini文件，不太好使
建议使用Cheats-Items/Blocks-Editable Mob Spawner功能
或者直接用怪物蛋刷出

replies.author: wzksnc
replies.txt_content:
q1059024337 发表于 2012-2-5 21:10 
这个需要该ini文件，不太好使
建议使用Cheats-Items/Blocks-Editable Mob Spawner功能
或者直接用怪物蛋 ...
我问别人问到了,拿Monster Wand 然后shift+右键
就出来了,自己选择,你那太麻烦
